TopicTitle: Custom Labels. Custom Ways to Name Vessels!

Articles.Content:
Here are the Available Craft Labels. (Ship, Lander, Station, Etc.). Custom Labels would allow people to create labels personalized labels like "VTOL" or "Equipment".

Modders, please consider this! It would help make the game funner but also, in the Tracking Station, people could narrow down which craft they want to see.

Thanks, DMSP

yea. would love to have that.

-Would be nice to have custom icons too. Or access to the ones used in the VAB parts lists.

Renaming from the tracking station is possible - select the vessel you want to rename and click on the info button - the 'i' on the right side of the screen. The info display pops up and if you click on the orange title bar it opens up the rename menu shown in the first post. Some additional vessel type icons would be nice...

This is a most excellent idea! In addition, I think it would be nice (though perhaps difficult to implement) to have the ability to label seperable parts of ships whilst building. I.e with an Apollo style Mun craft made of three parts separated by docking ports - launcher, LTV and lander, each section could be labelled appropriately, even named too.

A more concrete example is the Soyuz on re-entry; I leave the Orbital and Service modules in orbit, both of which typically get the name 'Soyuz Probe' or 'Soyuz Ship'. If I want to dock/rendevous another craft to one of these later, I have to switch to them first to identify exactly what part of the original ship they are.
